content:
{"name": "Camden County Board of Social Service", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/
Courteous service, equal treatment and a knowledgeable staff to assist you. Many services can be handled by the phone or by mail, thus saving you time. We are open open on Thursdays from 7:30 am until 7:30 pm for your convenience.
The Food Stamp Program is a nutritional supplement program that increases the food purchasing power of low income households.  The Food Stamp Program provides a food benefit allotment that is accessed through a Families First Electronic Benefit (EBT) Card.
Residents (age 18 or older) of Camden County may apply for the Food Stamp Program at the Camden County Board of Social Services and online:
https://www.njhelps.org/
https://www.nj.gov/humanservices/njsnap/
Note:  Food stamp regulations require a face-to-face interview.  Applicants who apply online will be contacted for an appointment.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.camdencounty.com/service/social-services/snap/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "101 Woodcrest Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Ashland", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08003", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.8720342, "longitude": -75.0076318}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 225-5143", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}]}
